question: You would like to invite your friend from abroad to a public event in your country. Write a letter to your friend.In your letterdescribe the public eventexplain why you think he/she would like the eventtell him/her about the other activities you can do.
text: Hello, how are you? I hope you're fine and still in good health. I'm excited to inform you that after two years, our city is finally will celebrate the "Timpupu festival" It is a five-day event where fruits and vegetables are gathered all over the province and they will be on display on the streets and what's more, you can eat it, free of charge. There's also a group of students in different schools parading on the streets while showing off the hand-made costume depending on the theme and the local government prepares numerous activities that will fascinate the locals as well as visitors.

In one of my letters, I mentioned to you how are region is blessed with overflowing fruits and vegetables, it is one of the highlights that the locals are proud of, me included. I'm inviting you to come and experience our once-a-year tradition, I'm sure it will be worth your time.
I'll wait for your positive reply to my invitation at you're earliest,
